title: I bought 2 $10 gift cards, but i just realised i dont have enough RP for the skin i want!
body: Today I bought 2 $10 gift cards, because there weren't any for $20 and now I realised that I don't have enough for the skin I want, because there aren't enough bonus RP. Do I just have to suck it up?

replies.body:
Well, that's due to a lack of research. But wait, you get bonus RP for prepaid cards? I thought that was only for RP ordered using online services.

How far off are you RP wise? Is this concerning an item which is on sale?
Hmm, you might be right. I'm short 15RP for DJ Sona...I'll just buy another prepaid card at some point.
Probably the best thing to do. I only hear cases of where Riot give points to people who already had the RP before the item was released, and that they were only 3 RP or less off.
